title: Bug 14047: StyledText inefficient redraw during text change with word wrap
OB: When changing the text in StyledText with word wrap enabled, the software triggers multiple unnecessary redraws.
EB: This behavior should be optimized to trigger at most one redraw for each visible line during text changes with word wrap enabled.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Enable word wrap in StyledText.
2. Change the text in StyledText.
3. Observe that multiple redraws occur instead of the expected single redraw per visible line.
